content.query:
-- Simple
SELECT doc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://patsynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales100/json/customers/*.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) WITH (
        doc VARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [result]


-- With Schema
SELECT 
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.Id') AS Id,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.FirstName') AS FirstName,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.LastName') AS LastName,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.CompanyName') AS CompanyName,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.Address.StreetName') AS StreetName,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.Address.Number') AS Number,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.Address.City') AS City,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.Address.Region') AS Region,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.Address.Country') AS Country
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://patsynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales100/json/customers/*.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH (
        doc VARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
